version_description:
BIG UPDATE!

◉ Collect 15 new Bikes
◉ Complete 16 new Levels
◉ Play new obstacles in Endless Mode
◉ Win Stars by completing Levels
◉ See your Ghost while playing Levels
◉ Tweaked many Challenges to be easier
◉ Various improvements and fixes

BIG UPDATE!

◉ Collect 15 new Bikes
◉ Complete 16 new Levels
◉ Play new obstacles in Endless Mode
◉ Win Stars by completing Levels
◉ See your Ghost while playing Levels
◉ Tweaked many Challenges to be easier
◉ Various improvements and fixes

◉ Fix for bike exploding at the start.
◉ Improvements for some obstacles.
